paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Employment Lawyer
detailsData.content: With over 30 years of experience, we have a proven track record of success in employment law cases.

detailsData.title: Supreme Court Victory
detailsData.content: Our landmark Supreme Court victory sets us apart as leaders in protecting workers' rights.

detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: We provide individualized attention to each client, ensuring their unique needs are met.

address: 8117 Manchester Ave Suite 505 Playa Del Rey, CA 90293
valueProp: The Employee Rights Law Group is dedicated to fighting for the rights of hard-working individuals in California. With a focus on employment law, we strive to bring justice to the American workplace.
CTA: Contact us for a free consultation

testimonalData.text: Cathe is an exceptional lawyer who truly cares about her clients. She fought tirelessly for my rights and I am grateful for her dedication.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: I was impressed by the professionalism and expertise of the team at Employee Rights Law Group. They guided me through a complex legal issue with ease.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: The legal advice I received from Cathe was invaluable. She helped me navigate a difficult employment situation and achieve a favorable outcome.
testimonalData.author: David Johnson
